ygData.subject: Re: BBC Answers here
ygData.msgSnippet: lvl three through a secret wall ... From: Remlin  To:  Sent: Saturday, July 03, 1999 8:10 PM Subject: Re: [EQCheats]
ygData.messageBody:
lvl three through a secret wall
----- Original Message -----
From: Remlin <remlin@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, July 03, 1999 8:10 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] BBC Answers here


> From: "Remlin" <remlin@...>
>
> Is it the ogre SK on the second level?
> That carries the BBC, or the SK on level 3?
>
> Later
> Chris
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chet Watkins <chetwatkins@...>
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 12:26 PM
> Subject: [EQCheats] BBC Answers here
>
>
> >From: Chet Watkins <chetwatkins@...>
> >
> >
> >Well, I am a friend of Dameat, and we took the advice of the spikes on
the
> >floor being the spawn line and that worked VERY well last night in our
> quest
> >for the BBC. Infact, Any rumors of there being a reset point in the room
is
> >totally wrong. The key point to getting the BBC is to keep the room clear
> at
> >ALL times. I ran in the room to make sure no spawns were hiding and it
> never
> >effected the spawn. We were there to obtain 2 Bone Bladed Claymores.
Within
> >4 to 4 and a half hours the SK spawned 3 times. Each time he carried the
> BBC
> >with him. We had to wait for the third becuase the second spawn was
stolen
> >under our noses. We walked out frustrated and tired, the people there can
> be
> >jerks, but with satisfaction that we obtained through battle the sword of
> >power and not through money. Good luck to all who try to camp him.
> >
> >Adol , 16th Level Paladin of Freeport
> >
> >>From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> >>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Question for Befallen Buffs
> >>Date: Thu, 1 Jul 1999 03:50:53 -0500
> >>
> >>From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
> >>
> >>What's the blackened wand for?
> >>
> >>-----Original Message-----
> >>From: Sandeep Shekar [mailto:sandeep@...]
> >>Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 11:22 AM
> >>To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >>Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Question for Befallen Buffs
> >>
> >>
> >>From: Sandeep Shekar <sandeep@...>
> >>
> >> >We went down in hopes of getting a BBC for our Pally last night. We
> were
> >> >there for two hours or so, and never saw the SK. We were told that
> there
> >>is
> >> >a "spawn line", ie, don't cross it or the SK will not spawn. Is this
> the
> >> >case? If so, is that line at the end of the tunnel? Or inside the
> room?
> >> >It was fairly frustrating. Also, there was another group there
camping
> >>for
> >> >the Robes, and I never saw that Theor..they...whatever guy that is
> >>supposed
> >> >to drop the robes. Does the same thing apply for him?
> >>
> >>I spent about 3 days in Befallen and my parties got a total of 5 BBCs, 3
> >>Thaum robes and 2 Gossamier robes, countless daggers of Marknek, and not
a
> >>single blackened wand (the item I was looking for). There is NO spawn
> line
> >>or any kind of anti camp radius on ANY of the mobs in befallen. I've
been
> >>standing next to mobs when they spawned with the aforementioned items.
> >>
> >> >Lastly..how often would you say the SK would normally spawn? Every
1/2
> >> >hour? Hour? 2 hours? I probably will not return to Befallen, unless
> it
> >>is
> >> >with my Paladin with the objective of getting that BBC for him....so
the
> >> >info would be appreciated. That place is just swarming with DE's, and
> it
> >> >makes my dwarven skin crawl.
> >>
> >>Yeah, I hate the place too. The spawn time in Befallen is about 20
> >>minutes, and the SK spawns about 25% of the time. About 33% of the time
> >>that he spawns, he has a BBC. So I guess if you are looking for a BBC,
> >>plan on being there for 3-4 hours or so. I hate camping, so I'd just
run
> >>the entire 3rd floor - Thaum room, Darkelf SK, and Troll SK. We still
> >>ended up at the start of the spawn cycle before the 20 minutes was up.
I
> >>hate this dungeon.
> >>
> >>Sandeep Shekar
> >>
> >>
